EmailTemplate.name: 17-BG-SSE-3rd P Webinar-RCR Webinar-T0023U.Email Invite1
EmailTemplate.subject: RCR Wireless Webinar June 21st: Build flexible and secure VoLTE networks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Find out why operators need their SBC, DRA and AAA functions to be more agile As a Communication Service Provider (CSP), security, reliability and performance are key concerns and determinants of your network’s quality and ultimately your customer’s experience.
Register for the RCR Wireless Webinar on June 21st to hear insights on how to evolve your network to launch new services, streamline your operations and prepare for the future of 5G and cloud. Enjoy!
Brendan Ziolo Head of Digital Networks Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
